SEARCH
Package othellogame.ui.view

Class ExitView

java.lang.Object
othellogame.ui.view.ExitView
public class ExitView extends Object
Represents the controller for the ExitScene FXML file in the Othello game application.

It manages the UI elements and actions associated with the ExitScene FXML file.

Follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern.

Version:
1.0, 12/07/2023
Author:
Dinh Thuy Nhat Vy
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ExitView

      public ExitView()
      Default constructor for the ExitView class.

      Note: this constructor is automatically generated by the compiler and is not intended for direct use.

  • Method Details

    • loadExitScene

      public void loadExitScene(javafx.scene.layout.Pane currentPane)
      Loads the ExitScene FXML file by initializing the UI components and setting the scene.
      Parameters:
      currentPane - the current pane from which the ExitScene is loaded.

    • updatePlayersResults

      public void updatePlayersResults(boolean finalResult, int playerIndex, String winner, int totalDiscs, Mark winnerMark, String resignedPlayer)
      Updates the results displayed on the ExitScene based on the game outcome.
      Parameters:
      finalResult - indicates whether the provided results are the final outcome of the game.
      playerIndex - index of the player.
      winner - name of the winner.
      totalDiscs - total discs obtained by the player.
      winnerMark - mark of the winner (BLACK or WHITE).
      resignedPlayer - name of the player who resigned.

    • onReplayClick

      private void onReplayClick()
      Handles the replay button click event.

      Resets the game state and navigates back to the menu scene.

    • onExitClick

      private void onExitClick()
      Handles the exit button click event.

      Displays the exit confirmation dialog.

    • onCloseIconClick

      private void onCloseIconClick()
      Handles the close icon click event in the exit confirmation dialog.

      Hides the exit confirmation dialog and restores the main exit scene.

    • onYesBtnClick

      private void onYesBtnClick()
      Handles the yes button click event in the exit confirmation dialog.

      Resets the resigned flag and navigates to the ThankYouScene.
